CreateStrategyInputStrategyBasic - Class in tradestock.view.textfieldview
This class represent the view when user choose to create a strategy with an end date , it enables user type the basis information about the strategy, include the number of stocks in the strategy, the strategy name, start date, end date, interval, and how much money the user invest every period.
